text: Richard Sui On Chang (November 30, 1941Episcopal Clerical Directory 2007. Church Publishing Incorprated. p. 159.â€“August 30, 2017) was bishop of the Episcopal Diocese of Hawaii from 1997 to 2006. He was ordained to the diaconate on March 5, 1966, and to the priesthood on September 4, 1966. Chang was consecrated Bishop of Hawaii on March 30, 1997 and died in Honolulu on August 30, 2017 from pneumonia at the age of 75."RIP: Richard Sui On Chang, fourth bishop of Hawaii ". Episcopal News Service. August 31, 2017. Retrieved September 1, 2017. ==References== ==Other websites== *From Hawaii's Bishop Richard S.O. title: Richard Sui On Chang
